channel.title: CVE Feed for Lamassu -- Bitcoin ATM Douro machines
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lamassu -- Bitcoin ATM Douro machines

item.title: CVE-2024-0675|2024-08-01T18:11:35.724Z -- lamassu -- bitcoin%20atm%20douro%20machines
item.description:
Vulnerability of improper checking for unusual or exceptional conditions
in Lamassu Bitcoin ATM Douro machines, in its 7.1 version,
the exploitation of which could allow an attacker with physical access to the ATM to escape kiosk mode, access the underlying Xwindow interface and execute arbitrary commands as an unprivileged user.

item.title: CVE-2024-0674|2024-08-01T18:11:35.674Z -- lamassu -- bitcoin%20atm%20douro%20machines
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in Lamassu Bitcoin ATM Douro machines, in its 7.1 version, which could allow a local user to acquire root permissions by modifying the updatescript.js, inserting special code inside the script and creating the done.txt file. This would cause the watchdog process to run as root and execute the payload stored in the updatescript.js.

item.title: CVE-2024-0676|2024-08-01T18:11:35.710Z -- lamassu -- bitcoin%20atm%20douro%20machines
item.description:
Weak password requirement vulnerability
in Lamassu Bitcoin ATM Douro machines, in its 7.1 version
, which allows a local user to interact with the machine where the application is installed, retrieve stored hashes from the machine and crack long 4-character passwords using a dictionary attack.
